column3: Why does she speak that way, you ask? An astute question, at last. The uma bugyo is a lady of a house most noble, and it is the high speech of the Far East that you note with pleasing keenness.
She is high-minded as well as gently spoken, and this labor is one that she freely undertook over considerable...skepticism in some circles.
Your head is bare, adventurer. Do I have another uma kabuto, you ask? There was meant to be but one, a proof of <If(PlayerParameter(4))>m'lady's<Else/>m'lord's</If> success in Gridania.
How vexing. I have no choice but to grant you another, but...how vexing.
